summary:
a collection of authentic Norse and Celtic rugs copied/clone-brushed from photographs of artefacts.
update; now has a couple more norse rug textures and meshes work fine.
descriptionHtml:
a collection of authentic Norse and Celtic rugs copied/clone-brushed from photographs of artefacts. I used the clone brush with the overlay filter to transcribe the photographic images onto photos of rugs, then onto the texture files.


if some don't show up it may be because I have mods you don't,  at worst download any rug mods then install this over the top ~ but I think they will all show up.
author: amorphos
